com.fluidops.iwb.api
Interface DBBulkService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DBBulkServiceImpl
public interface DBBulkService

Bulk operations on the RDF database.

Method Detail

updateOntology

void updateOntology(java.io.File ontologyFile)
Load the given rdf-xml file into the database and replace an old version. The data is loaded into the context: "http://www.fluidops.com/ontologyContext/" + ontologyFile.getName() If there already is a triple "http://www.fluidops.com/name/" + ontologyFile.getName() Vocabulary.VERSION <version> and this version is newer or equals to the version found in the file, the import does not take place. Otherwise the former version is replaced.

Parameters:
ontologyFile - A file in rdf-xml format.

bootstrapDB

void bootstrapDB(java.io.File dbFile)
Load the given file into the database. The data is loaded into the context: "urn:bootstrap-" + dbFile.getName(). If this context already exists it is deleted.

Parameters:
dbFile - A file in any format supported by Sesame.
See Also:
RepositoryConnection.add(File, String, org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat, org.openrdf.model.Resource...)

bootstrapDBAndRemove

void bootstrapDBAndRemove(java.io.File dbFile)
This basically calls bootstrapDB(File) and deleted the file after a successful import.

Parameters:
dbFile - gets deleted after successful import.

bootstrapDBAllFrom

void bootstrapDBAllFrom(java.io.File dir)
Calls bootstrapDB(File) for each file in dir (non-recursively)

Parameters:
dir - directory from which files are loaded.

bootstrapDBAllFromAndRemove

void bootstrapDBAllFromAndRemove(java.io.File dir)
Calls bootstrapDBAndRemove(File) for each file in dir (non-recursively)

Parameters:
dir - directory from which files are loaded.
